data.name: Soulveyor
data.detailed_description:
You came to this new land in search of a better life, and in the process you find yourself becoming a Soulveyor. Build up your land from scratch and collect souls throughout the world in order to help you become the best duelist there is. As you become stronger, test your strength against the various temples scattered throughout the world. What secrets lie within them? Show the world what it means to be a Soulveyor.

Build/Craft


As you tend to your land you can grow crops, build machines to process your products, use advanced conduit systems to transport your items, energy, fluids, and gasses, and create even more items to help you along your journey.

Seal Souls


There are souls scattered across the world. Discover them by doing various tasks such as mining, chopping trees, harvesting food, etc. and duel them in order to properly seal their soul.

Duel


To complete a seal you must duel the soul by using your own deck of scrolls in order to help you! You’ll be transported to a battlefield where your duel will commence! You can even fight alongside your soul-mate, resulting in a 2v2 duel!

Play With Friends


Have as many players join your world as you want. Each player that joins gets their own plot of land to work on! Or take your character over to their world and stay for a while!

Exploration


Every world is completely unique and randomly generated. Explore the secrets of your land, or go visit other worlds and bring back their goods to yours!

data.short_description: Build and craft your very own land, explore the world, work together with friends, and duel your way to becoming the best Soulveyor to ever walk the face of the planet, by sealing souls inside of your scrolls.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista and above
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
